title: Cricketer Haris Rauf appointed as Ambassador of Parliamentary SDGs Task Force
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 15 (APP): Deputy Speaker of the National Assembly Zahid Akram Durrani Thursday made an announcement regarding the appointment of Pakistani cricket team’s fast bowler, Haris Rauf, as the Ambassador of the Parliamentary SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals) Task Force.
While chairing the session, the deputy speaker informed the House about the presence of Haris Rauf in the speaker’s gallery, where he observed the proceedings.
He said that Haris Rauf had been announced as Ambassador of Parliamentary SDGs Task Force.
